title: Tata Power invests over Rs 4,200 cr in network expansion, upgrade in Odisha
description: Tata Power has invested Rs 4,245 crore in infrastructure expansion and network upgrades in Odisha over the past 3-4 years. The company operates four joint ventures with the government, serving over 9 million customers. The investment includes Rs 1,232 crore through government-backed schemes, including laying 33 KV lines and adding 30,230 distribution transformers.
